stGToken (staked GToken) share system with:      - Slash-aware share calculation      - Multi-slasher support (Registry, SuperPaymaster)      - Lock management for multiple protocols (MySBT, SuperPaymaster, Registry)      - Configurable exit fees (time-based tiers or flat rate)      - Low minimum stake (0.01 GT, like Lido's no minimum)      - Treasury for protocol fees Architecture: - Users stake GT \u2192 receive stGToken shares - Protocols (MySBT, SuperPaymaster, Registry) lock user's stGToken - Users can't unstake while locked - Unlocking charges exit fees \u2192 treasury - Registry and SuperPaymaster can slash for malicious behavior v2.0: Lido-compliant architecture with governance slash","errors":{"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"authorizeSlasher(address,bool)":{"params":{"authorized":"Whether to authorize or revoke","slasher":"Slasher contract address"}},"availableBalance(address)":{"params":{"user":"User address"},"returns":{"_0":"available Available sGToken shares"}},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"This automatically reflects slash penalties","params":{"user":"User address"},"returns":{"balance":"Current balance in GT equivalent"}},"calculateExitFee(address,address)":{"params":{"locker":"Locker contract address","user":"User address"},"returns":{"fee":"Exit fee in sGToken shares"}},"calculateShares(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"Amount of GToken"},"returns":{"shares":"Estimated sGToken shares"}},"configureLocker(address,bool,uint256,uint256[],uint256[],address)":{"params":{"authorized":"Whether authorized to lock stakes","baseExitFee":"Base exit fee (for simple lockers)","feeRecipient":"Address to receive exit fees (address(0) = use treasury) Example for MySBT (flat fee):   baseExitFee = 0.1 ether   timeTiers = []   tierFees = [] Example for SuperPaymaster (tiered):   baseExitFee = 0   timeTiers = [90 days, 180 days, 365 days]   tierFees = [15 ether, 10 ether, 7 ether, 5 ether]   (< 90d: 15, 90-180d: 10, 180-365d: 7, \u2265365d: 5)","locker":"Locker contract address","tierFees":"Array of fees for each time tier","timeTiers":"Array of time thresholds in seconds"}},"constructor":{"params":{"_gtoken":"GToken ERC20 contract address"}},"gTokenToShares(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"GT amount"},"returns":{"_0":"shares sGToken shares"}},"getGlobalStats()":{"returns":{"_totalShares":"Total sGToken shares","_totalSlashed":"Total GToken slashed","_totalStaked":"Total GToken staked","effectiveValue":"Value per share (scaled by 1e18)"}},"getLockInfo(address,address)":{"params":{"locker":"Locker contract","user":"User address"},"returns":{"_0":"lockInfo Complete lock information"}},"getLockedStake(address,address)":{"params":{"locker":"Locker contract address (Registry or SuperPaymaster)","user":"User address"},"returns":{"_0":"amount Locked stGToken shares"}},"getLockerConfig(address)":{"params":{"locker":"Locker address"},"returns":{"_0":"config Complete locker configuration"}},"getStakeInfo(address)":{"params":{"user":"User address"},"returns":{"_0":"info Complete stake information"}},"getUnstakeTimeRemaining(address)":{"params":{"user":"User address"},"returns":{"remaining":"Seconds remaining (0 if can unstake)"}},"lockStake(address,uint256,string)":{"details":"Called by authorized lockers (MySBT, SuperPaymaster, etc.)","params":{"amount":"Amount of sGToken shares to lock","purpose":"Lock purpose description","user":"User whose stake to lock"}},"lockedBalanceBy(address,address)":{"params":{"locker":"Locker contract address","user":"User address"},"returns":{"_0":"amount Locked stGToken shares"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"previewExitFee(address,address)":{"params":{"locker":"Locker contract","user":"User address"},"returns":{"fee":"Exit fee in sGToken shares","netAmount":"Net amount after fee (in sGToken shares)"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"requestUnstake()":{"details":"User must wait UNSTAKE_DELAY before calling unstake()"},"setTreasury(address)":{"params":{"newTreasury":"New treasury address"}},"sharesToGToken(uint256)":{"params":{"shares":"sGToken shares"},"returns":{"_0":"amount GT amount"}},"slash(address,uint256,string)":{"details":"Increases totalSlashed, automatically reducing all balanceOf values      Called by Registry or SuperPaymaster for malicious/failing operators","params":{"amount":"Amount of GToken to slash","reason":"Slash reason","user":"User to slash"},"returns":{"slashedAmount":"Actual amount slashed (may be less if insufficient balance)"}},"stake(uint256)":{"details":"Share calculation:      - First stake: shares = amount      - Subsequent: shares = amount * totalShares / (totalStaked - totalSlashed)","params":{"amount":"Amount of GToken to stake (must be >= 0.01 GT)"},"returns":{"shares":"Number of sGToken shares received"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"unlockStake(address,uint256)":{"details":"Called by locker when user exits (burns SBT, unregisters operator, etc.)      Exit fee is transferred to treasury","params":{"grossAmount":"Gross amount to unlock (before exit fee)","user":"User whose stake to unlock"},"returns":{"netAmount":"Net amount unlocked after exit fee deduction"}},"unstake()":{"details":"Returns actual balance (original amount minus proportional slash)      Reverts if stake is locked by any protocol"}},"title":"GTokenStaking with Lock Management and Slash System","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"GTOKEN()":{"notice":"GToken ERC20 contract address"},"MIN_STAKE()":{"notice":"Minimum stake amount: 0.01 GToken (Lido-like low lock"},"calculateShares(uint256)":{"notice":"Calculate shares for given stake amount"},"configureLocker(address,bool,uint256,uint256[],uint256[],address)":{"notice":"Configure locker contract with params.feeRecipient: Address to receive exit fees (address(0) = use treasury) Example for MySBT (flat fee):   baseExitFee = 0.1 ether   timeTiers = []   tierFees = [] Example for SuperPaymaster (tiered):   baseExitFee = 0   timeTiers = [90 days, 180 days, 365 days]   tierFees = [15 ether, 10 ether, 7 ether, 5 ether]   (< 90d: 15, 90-180d: 10, 180-365d: 7, 365d: 5)
params.tierFees: Array of fees for each time tier
params.timeTiers: Array of time thresholds in seconds

lockStake(address,uint256,string).details: Called by authorized lockers (MySBT, SuperPaymaster, etc.)

params.amount: Amount of sGToken shares to lock

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

returns.netAmount: Net amount after fee (in sGToken shares)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requestUnstake().details: User must wait UNSTAKE_DELAY before calling unstake()

slash(address,uint256,string).details: Increases totalSlashed, automatically reducing all balanceOf values      Called by Registry or SuperPaymaster for malicious/failing operators

returns.slashedAmount: Actual amount slashed (may be less if insufficient balance)

stake(uint256).details: Share calculation:      - First stake: shares = amount      - Subsequent: shares = amount * totalShares / (totalStaked - totalSlashed)

params.amount: Amount of GToken to stake (must be >= 0.01 GT)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unlockStake(address,uint256).details: Called by locker when user exits (burns SBT, unregisters operator, etc.)      Exit fee is transferred to treasury

params.grossAmount: Gross amount to unlock (before exit fee)

returns.netAmount: Net amount unlocked after exit fee deduction

unstake().details: Returns actual balance (original amount minus proportional slash)      Reverts if stake is locked by any protocol

MIN_STAKE().notice: Minimum stake amount: 0.01 GToken (Lido-like low barrier)

availableBalance(address).notice: Get available (unlocked) balance in sGToken shares

balanceOf(address).notice: Query user's total sGToken balance (shares value after slash)

calculateExitFee(address,address).notice: Calculate exit fee for a user's lock

calculateShares(uint256).notice: Calculate shares for given stake amount

configureLocker(address,bool,uint256,uin.notice: Configure locker contract with exit fee parameters

gTokenToShares(uint256).notice: Convert GT amount to sGToken shares

getLockedStake(address,address).notice: Get locked stake for user from specific locker (alias for lockedBalanceBy)

getUnstakeTimeRemaining(address).notice: Get time remaining for unstake delay

lockStake(address,uint256,string).notice: Lock user's sGToken for usage by authorized protocol

lockedBalanceBy(address,address).notice: Get locked balance by specific locker

previewExitFee(address,address).notice: Preview exit fee and net amount for user

setTreasury(address).notice: Set treasury address for exit fees

sharesToGToken(uint256).notice: Convert sGToken shares to GT amount

slash(address,uint256,string).notice: Execute slash on user (called by authorized slashers)

stake(uint256).notice: Stake GToken and receive sGToken shares

unlockStake(address,uint256).notice: Unlock user's sGToken with exit fee
